eda.sql_vendor_org_hierarchy_1: SELECT DISTINCT c_xwalk.cgac, c_xwalk.cgac_agency_name, c_xwalk.maj_command, c_xwalk.majcom_display_name, c_xwalk.dodaac_ric FROM pds_parsed.cage_xwalk as c_xwalk WHERE c_xwalk.dodaac_ric IN %s
eda.sql_vendor_org_hierarchy_2: SELECT DISTINCT c_xwalk.cage_code_name FROM pds_parsed.cage_xwalk as c_xwalk WHERE c_xwalk.cage_code = %s
eda.sql_line_item_details: SELECT elin_base_line_item_details, elin_extension_line_item_details, li_base_line_item_details, li_extension_line_item_details, li_type_line_item_details, obligated_amount_line_item_details, obligated_amount_prv_line_item_details, prod_or_svc_line_item_details, prod_or_svc_desc_line_item_details, prod_svc_uom_line_item_details FROM  pds_parsed.vw_pds_line_items_psc_no_file WHERE row_id = %s
eda.sql_is_in_process_state: SELECT gc_status FROM public.eda_piee_log WHERE gc_status = 'Processing' LIMIT 1;
eda.sql_daily_process: SELECT audit_from_loc, audit_moved_loc, output_path, gc_status FROM public.eda_piee_log WHERE gc_status IS NULL AND file_type = 'pdf' ORDER BY output_path;
eda.sql_set_daily_status_on_log: UPDATE public.eda_piee_log SET gc_status = %s WHERE  audit_moved_loc = %s AND output_path= %s AND file_type='pdf';
eda.sql_insert_process_status: INSERT INTO public.gc_process_status(s3_prefix, status, modified_date) VALUES (%s, %s, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ON CONFLICT (s3_prefix) DO NOTHING;
eda.sql_reprocess_status: SELECT s3_prefix FROM public.gc_process_status WHERE status is NULL ORDER BY random() < 0.01 LIMIT 10;
eda.sql_reprocess_set_status_process: UPDATE public.gc_process_status SET status= %s, modified_date=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP  WHERE s3_prefix= %s ;
